title: cultural_data_American_Writers_Museum
text:
﻿App Link on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.encurate.americanwritersmuseum.
Application Name: American Writers Museum.
Number of Reviews: .
Application Description: Enhance your AWM experience with its first mobile app! Spark inspiration as you delve into more than 400 years of American writing and more than 300 writers of many genres. This custom app powered by Encurate Mobile Technology allows you to choose personalized tours, utilize an interactive map, and more while exploring the Museum at your pace. As you walk around the Museum, simply keep your smartphone where you can feel it vibrate and the app will notify you of spaces that match your chosen interests.The AWM mobile app features: •Personalized Tour Content: Choose what you are most interested in. Not sure where to start? Check out the Highlights! Running short on time? Find out what you can’t miss, and learn what you want to see next time.•Interactive Map: Easily know where to go with the interactive map. Practical information like the location of the restrooms and exits is easy to find through the Search function. The location-aware map will show you your location and where you want to go. Find the areas you are most interested in and add them to your “Likes” page to review and explore later.•Get the most out of the Museum’s interactive features! The app is your best guide to the interactive elements of the Museum. All the senses will be engaged through the exhibits, with the app leading you to our favorite spots and highlighting audio, scent, and visual elements.Read moreCollapse.
